nodes.text: The Jedi Order established a temple in a moist lowland on the planet Caamas.

According to legend, several Jedi visited Caamas in an attempt to learn "proper moral judgement." Later, the Jedi established a temple on the planet, which they used for contemplation. After the Great Jedi Purge, the temple was abandoned and was later destroyed by the Caamas Firestorm. Only a few rooms survived.
